de.dfki.omm.acl

Class OMMUsernamePasswordCredentials

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dfki.omm.acl.OMSCredentials
      • de.dfki.omm.acl.OMMUsernamePasswordCredentials

  • public class OMMUsernamePasswordCredentials
extends OMSCredentials
    Models HTTP_BASIC credentials as a pair of username and password (inheriting a clear text name from OMSCredentials)
